data.title: Quality Innovation Prosperity
data.meta_description: Quality Innovation Prosperity is a biannual academic journal focusing on original and by the editorial board reviewed scientific papers on the quality of work, production and life from any social domains.
data.text:
Quality Innovation Prosperity (QIP) is an international, cross-disciplinary, scholarly, peer-reviewed, and open-access journal covering original, empirical, and theoretical research in the broader field of quality. Quality also takes sustainability into account and includes a comprehensive view of the social, environmental and economic development associated with the digital and circular economy. QIP journal provides an advanced forum for studies related to strategic quality management, quality innovation, quality of life and quality engineering both in private and public organisations. The journal is intended to address the academic and professional community operating in this field.

Publications that are not focused on studies related to strategic quality management, quality innovation, quality of life, or quality engineering, do not meet the formal requirements (according to the template), or the Grammarly plagiarism checker detects an inappropriate match are rejected under the desktop rejection. The paper can also be desk-rejected if the journal does not have enough space for it; for example, there may be an overriding need to maintain a balance of papers in the journal.

The journal is published online-only from 2024-01-01.
